vault_cert_auth_backend_role.description: Managing roles in an Cert auth backend in Vault

certificate.description: CA certificate used to validate client certificates

allowed_names.description: Allowed subject names for authenticated client certificates

allowed_common_names.description: Allowed the common names for authenticated client certificates

allowed_dns_sans.description: Allowed alternative dns names for authenticated client certificates

allowed_email_sans.description: Allowed emails for authenticated client certificates

allowed_uri_sans.description: Allowed URIs for authenticated client certificates

allowed_organization_units.description: Allowed organization units for authenticated client certificates

required_extensions.description: TLS extensions required on client certificates

display_name.description: The name to display on tokens issued under this role.

backend.description: Path to the mounted Cert auth backend
